sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Israel's forces say they are targeting Hamas militants at Gaza's Ashifa Hospital as medical staff warn premature babies and patients are dying inside.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: An Israeli national lobbying for the release of Hamas hostages reveals how he learned the fate of his own kidnapped relatives. The UK Supreme Court says no to the government's plans to send asylum seekers to Rwanda for processing Israeli forces have stormed Gaza's al-shifa hospital after a lengthy standoff Wednesday night

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The Israeli Defense Force said it carried out a quote precise and targeted operation against Hamas militants despite the hospital being full of hundreds of displaced people, patients and medical staff.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Hours earlier Pentagon spokesperson John Kirby said the White House has evidence that Hamas is using al-Shifa as a command center.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: I can confirm for you that we have information that Hamas and the Palestinian Islamic Jihad use some hospitals in the Gaza Strip, including al-Shifa, and tunnels underneath them to conceal and to support their military operations and to hold hostages.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: During the day, the Hamas-run health ministry had called for a ceasefire to evacuate three dozen premature babies who were battling for their lives without functioning incubators.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: After days of airstrikes around the hospital, its power has been cut and images of vulnerable babies raised international concern.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The situation in Gaza's other hospitals is also dire, with the United Nations saying 22 of 36 are not functional يعملون بسبب عدم تحديد المحيطات والمخاطر والتخطيط ويقوم بإستخدام محيطات مستقبلية للأسعار المتحدة ويقوم بإستخدام محيطات مستقبلية للأسعار المتحدة ويقوم بإستخدام محيطات مستقبلية للأسعار المتحدة Hamas continues to deny Israel's claims that it is using hospitals, in particular Al-Shifa, to conceal or support their military operations and to hold hostages.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: As Israel's war with the Hamas militant group rages on in the besieged Gaza Strip, human rights groups have reported an increase in violence against Palestinians and further restrictions on their movement in the occupied West Bank.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: According to the United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs, at least 168 Palestinians have been killed by Israeli forces in recent weeks and an additional eight by Israeli settlers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's military says it is conducting quote, counter-terrorism activities in several West Bank cities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: In Tul Karem, on the West Bank's northwestern border, seven Palestinians were killed in a raid on Tuesday night after the IDF said engineering vehicles uncovered explosive devices planted on routes to attack its forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: They claimed soldiers questioned and apprehended wanted suspects, and during exchanges of fire with armed assailants, a number of them were killed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The Israeli military says it has arrested more than 1,400 people in the West Bank, excluding East Jerusalem, since the 7th of October.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Last week, Gil Dickman, whose family members were kidnapped and murdered by Hamas,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: received a text message from a number saying it was the Qassam Brigades, Hamas' military wing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The text is saying, family, this is a message from Al-Kassam. Al-Kassam is one of the units of Hamas. Carmel Gat, the name of my cousin, we offered your government a deal, release all the Zionist hostages for releasing all the Palestinians prisoners and if you want to know the situation of all your hostages just stay in touch with us and there's a link there. He didn't click on the link for fear it would hack his phone. Gil's cousin Carmel Gat was kidnapped by Hamas on October 7th along with the wife of his other cousin Yarden Roman. His aunt Kinneret was murdered. He learned of her fate by seeing a video of her alive under capture and then another of her body laying near the home she once loved.

sentences.sentence: I scrolled through videos on Telegram when I saw the video. She was handcuffed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They were walking her down the streets of the kibbutz. And in another video, I saw her face to the ground, murdered.

sentences.sentence: Yeah.

sentences.sentence: It also took a lot of time until the IDF came.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.sentence: Well, there have been many reports this week saying the hostage negotiations are reaching a critical momentum Although this has been formally denied by the Israeli government who say as soon as there is news the families of those captured will be The first to know and then the world will know but meanwhile Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has vowed to continue the intensification Of the Israeli offensive in Gaza Whereas we know thousands of people have been killed, thousands of children have been killed, and as former U.S. President Barack Obama has said, life is unbearable.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: A Supreme Court victory for opponents of the UK government's plans to send asylum seekers

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: to Rwanda for processing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Justices at Britain's top legal authority have ruled the policy illegal on the grounds that migrants once in Rwanda will be at risk of being sent back to the countries they had fled.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The UK government argued that the African host nation was committed to eliminating such expulsions but failed to convince the panel of judges.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The changes needed to eliminate the risk of reformant may be delivered in the future but they have not been shown to be in place now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Home Secretary's appeal is therefore dismissed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Under a deal signed in 2022, Rwanda agreed to accommodate some asylum seekers while their claims were being processed, but the first deportation flight was halted by a last-minute appeal. Rishi Sunak's government could now appeal to ruling at the European Court of Human Rights.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: If it were to fail there, the government would likely come under renewed internal pressure to withdraw from the European Court Treaty.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Cyprus. That's according to a new investigation by the International Consortium of Investigative Journalists and more than 60 news organizations. The investigation involved some 3.6 million leaked confidential documents that revealed the EU member is being used for dodgy financial transactions. The list of culprits include the former owner of the English football club Chelsea, Roman Abramovich. It says that he took advantage of Cyprus' complex financial network to circumvent UEFA and English Premier League rules.

sentences.sentence: The rescue operation continues for the 40 workers trapped in a tunnel under construction in northern India since Sunday. In the Uttarakhand region, colleagues of those trapped are angered by rescue delays. Authorities are calling for larger machines to be able to dig down to where the workers are.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Communication has been maintained via walkie-talkies and the trapped workers have been able to receive food and water but some are already showing signs of saturation adding to this on Wednesday India suffered another tragedy a bus carrying 56 people crashed into a mountainous area and fell more than 200 meters down a slope. At least 37 people died and 19 were injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A French court has issued an international arrest warrant for Syria's president for his alleged involvement in chemical weapons attacks in 2013. Bashar al-Assad is accused of complicity in crimes against humanity and war crimes. The French court is also targeting the Syrian leader's brother and two generals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The Yugoslav wars from 1991 to 2001 still haunt many older Serbians to this day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: But what about young Serbs?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: According to the Youth Initiative for Human Rights, one in four Serbs between the age of 18 to 30 believe the West is responsible for the Yugoslav wars, while another one in four say the former leaders of Serbia, Croatia and Bosnia are responsible.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: But 50% of the young population admit their knowledge of these conflicts is poor.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: There is a large dose of ignorance about the war itself in the 90s, but on the other hand, there is a great concern in the sense of reading in one national reading of events from the 90s in a nationalist way.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The International Criminal Tribunal in The Hague, a UN court that dealt with war crimes committed during this time, was politically motivated. They are talking to their parents about this and their opinion is influenced by the public discourse about the wars and the general process of reconciliation in the media.
